events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product is not what I paid for.
System classified the issue under the refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back due to an incorrect order.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in handling refund requests for incorrect deliveries.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand that you received the wrong item and need a refund. I am here to help resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can verify the details and process your refund?
I have attached a clear photo of the incorrect item and included my order number 123456789 for your reference. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for providing the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days, and you do not need to return the incorrect item.
That sounds great, thank you for the prompt response and easy refund process. I appreciate your help in resolving this matter.
The refund process has been completed on our end. You should see the credit in your account shortly. Please reach out if you have any further issues.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund successfully and everything is now to your satisfaction.
Yes, the refund has appeared in my bank account today. Thank you so much for your help and follow-up!
